content.html: 7 years old. That’s how old my daughter is when she’s been told by a peer she needs to cut out treats to lose her belly. And she’s begging us to let her cut out treats so she can lose her belly. She doesn’t have a belly. She’s fit & strong. And even if she had a belly, she’s 7.
content.value:
7 years old. That’s how old my daughter is when she’s been told by a peer she needs to cut out treats to lose her belly.

And she’s begging us to let her cut out treats so she can lose her belly.

She doesn’t have a belly. She’s fit & strong. And even if she had a belly, she’s 7.
